name.ja: <ruby>ＲＲ<rt>レイド・ラプターズ</rt></ruby>－ノアール・レイニアス

text.en: During your Main Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can target 1 "Raidraptor" monster you control; add 1 "Raidraptor" monster with a different Level from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; increase or decrease the Levels of all "Raidraptor" monsters you currently control by 1. You can only use each effect of "Raidraptor - Noir Lanius" once per turn.
